examples: put on special buses for the big game
she gets special (or particular) satisfaction from her volunteer work

results.definition: surpassing what is common or usual or expected
examples: he paid especial attention to her
a special reason to confide in her
what's so special about the year 2000?

results.definition: unique or specific to a person or thing or category
examples: the special features of a computer

results.definition: having a specific function or scope
examples: a special (or specific) role in the mission

results.definition: adapted to or reserved for a particular purpose
a dish or meal given prominence in e.g. a restaurant
a special offering (usually temporary and at a reduced price) that is featured in advertising
examples: they are having a special on pork chops

results.definition: a television production that features a particular person or work or topic
examples: the last of a series of BBC specials on Iran is being shown tonight

results.definition: for a special service or occasion
examples: a special adviser to the committee
had to get special permission for the event
